task-1770099545984-qriryv.description: Research: Analyze top 3 ADHD task management apps, identify features Gather is missing

task-1770099555498-1g6w7y.description: QA: Open the app at localhost:3000, test the main user flow (add task, break down with AI, complete steps), take screenshots of any issues

task-1770099560012-jwxjpz.description: Architecture: Audit StackView.tsx (1000+ lines), identify components that can be extracted

task-1770104141990-w8wcd7.description: Extract dismiss count utilities from StackView.tsx (lines 66-85) to /src/lib/dismissCounts.ts - Quick win, ~20 lines

task-1770104142761-appi6h.description: Extract StackViewEmptyState component from StackView.tsx (lines 599-695) to separate file - ~100 lines

task-1770104143502-86eenc.description: Extract StackViewMainCard component from StackView.tsx (lines 885-1047) to separate file - ~160 lines

result.notes: Analyzed and decided against extraction - component is too tightly coupled with drag/animation state, would require 15+ props

task-1770104144509-bq9xhc.description: Implement One-Task-at-a-Time Mode (Focus Launcher) - Full-screen overlay showing ONE task, extending existing FocusMode

result.notes: Implemented Focus Launcher with smart task selection algorithm

task-1770104145182-33o9jb.description: Implement "Help Me Pick" Task Randomizer - AI-powered decision maker that selects the best task when users are paralyzed

result.notes: Implemented Help Me Pick with shuffle animation, limited re-picks, encouraging messages

task-1770105263531-qxz4mx.description: Implement Brain Dump Mode - Add /dump command to UnifiedInput that opens a modal for freeform thought capture. AI extracts individual tasks from the text and suggests breakdowns. Core ADHD need for racing thoughts. Leverages existing ChatModal and AI streaming infrastructure.

task-1770105264910-yuojoe.description: Implement Visual Hour Timeline - Enhance DayView with horizontal hour-block visualization. Show scheduled tasks as colored blocks spanning time with current time indicator. Helps ADHD "time blindness" - Tiimo's winning feature.

task-1770105266635-usudxz.description: Add Completion Insights to StatsCard - Show hour-of-day completion heatmap and "You're most productive around 10am" type insights. Uses existing completion timestamp data. No guilt-tripping, just pattern recognition.

task-1770105268144-dj2i0u.description: Add Quick Voice Input - Add microphone icon to UnifiedInput using Web Speech API (client-side). Transcribes voice to text for zero-friction task capture on mobile. Graceful fallback if unsupported.

task-1770106088118-j9lywq.description: Fix SSR hydration mismatch in BrainDumpModal - Replace direct navigator.platform access with useEffect-based detection to avoid server/client mismatch. Line 202 in BrainDumpModal.tsx.

task-1770106089744-bpbe71.description: Add API timeout to brain-dump route - Add AbortController with 30s timeout to prevent hanging requests. Also improve error logging to avoid leaking user content.

task-1770106091009-792ym3.description: Fix HelpMePick same task re-pick - Track previously shown tasks and exclude them from random selection to ensure variety across re-picks.

task-1770106093506-qte444.description: Add Body Doubling / Work-Along Mode - Virtual coworking feature with ambient working sounds plus periodic gentle text-to-speech check-ins. Extend FocusMode with work-along toggle using SpeechSynthesis API. Proven ADHD technique for accountability.

result.summary: Added Work-Along Mode with SpeechSynthesis check-ins to FocusMode

task-1770106095677-41rls9.description: Add Context Preservation Notes - When user navigates away from a task, prompt for 1-sentence "where I left off" note. Show prominently when returning. Reduces task-switching cost. Use existing context_text field.

result.summary: Created ContextCaptureModal.tsx for task context preservation

task-1770106097010-etdo0j.description: Extract shared CloseButton component - Duplicate X close button pattern in BrainDumpModal, HelpMePick, FocusLauncher. Create reusable CloseButton.tsx component.

result.summary: Created CloseButton.tsx and refactored BrainDumpModal, HelpMePick, FocusLauncher

task-1770106612506-f3pve5.description: Add Search/Filter by Energy Level - Quick filter buttons (üîã High, ‚ö° Medium, ü™´ Low, All) above task list. Filter tasks by energy tag to help ADHD users match available energy to tasks. Quick win feature that leverages existing energy field on tasks.

result.notes: Created EnergyFilter.tsx with 4 filter buttons, integrated into StackView, added e2e tests

task-1770106615356-z2yvih.description: Add Mood Tracking with Productivity Correlation - Simple mood picker on app open (5 emoji scale: üò§üòïüòêüôÇüòä). Store with timestamp in user data. Show correlation insights: "You complete 40% more when starting in üôÇ mood". No guilt-tripping, just pattern awareness for ADHD self-understanding.

result.notes: Created MoodPicker.tsx with 5-emoji scale, useMoodEntries hook, mood correlation insights in StatsCard

task-1770106617628-w1yjnx.description: Refactor GatherApp.tsx (1,093 lines) - Extract major sections into separate components: 1) KeyboardShortcuts handler, 2) ChatModal integration, 3) HelpMePick integration, 4) FocusLauncher integration, 5) BrainDump integration. Target: reduce to ~600 lines or less.

result.notes: Started refactoring - extracted 3 components/hooks, reduced 115 lines. More work needed.

task-1770106619251-q7kfkc.description: Refactor useAIConversation.ts (1,386 lines) - Split into smaller focused hooks: 1) useAIChat for conversation logic, 2) useAITaskBreakdown for task decomposition, 3) useAIStreaming for streaming utilities. Improves testability and maintainability.

result.summary: Refactored useAIConversation.ts from 1,386 to 727 lines (47% reduction). Created 3 new focused hooks: useAIStreaming.ts (199 lines), useAITaskBreakdown.ts (350 lines), useAIChat.ts (327 lines). Build passes, tests pass, backward compatible.

task-1770108040387-g0lp9n.description: Fix Focus Mode Sound/Work-Along buttons not visible - Code exists at FocusMode.tsx lines 273-312 but buttons don't render in UI. QA confirmed the issue. Need to investigate why the toggle buttons are not appearing in the timer toolbar area.

task-1770108042317-vzew33.description: Fix hydration error: nested button in Checkbox/FocusMode - React warning: button cannot be descendant of button. Located in Checkbox component when used within FocusMode. Causes hydration mismatch.

task-1770108043986-n5nn7z.description: Extract StackViewMainCard component from StackView.tsx - Main card rendering logic (~160 lines) should be extracted to separate file. StackView is currently 972 lines, could reduce to ~750 lines.

task-1770108046296-9ti7xj.description: Add ARIA labels to HourTimeline - Task blocks are clickable but lack proper accessibility attributes. Add role="button", aria-label with task title and time, tabIndex, and keyboard handler for Enter key.

changes: Added aria-label with task title and time

task-1770108243639-xm97gu.description: Home Screen Widgets for iOS/Android - Implement home screen widgets that show todays schedule at a glance. Tiimo proves this is critical for ADHD users - widgets make time visible without opening the app. Key features: Next task widget with countdown, Daily overview with color-coded time blocks, Quick-capture widget for brain dumps. Priority: HIGH

result.summary: Documented as Phase 3 scope - requires React Native migration (8-12 weeks). PWA shortcuts are the only current option for web apps. True home screen widgets require native iOS/Android code

task-1770108247306-0p0bk3.description: Gentle Gamification System XP without Shame - Add dopamine-friendly reward system that acknowledges progress without streak anxiety. ADHD brains have lower dopamine availability making external rewards essential. Key features: Momentum Points for any task completion not just streaks, Visual progress bar or garden that grows, Unlockable themes/colors as rewards, NO broken streak shaming - missed days pause not reset. Inspired by Habitica and Finch. Priority: HIGH

implemented: Database schema with user_rewards, point_transactions, rewards_catalog tables
pointsCalculator with levels, garden stages, momentum tracking
useRewards hook with full state management and demo mode
ProgressGarden component with visual growth stages
CSS animations for garden and points
followUp: Wire earnPoints into useStepHandlers for automatic point earning
Add E2E tests for gamification flow

task-1770108248669-0g7k3b.description: AI Coaching Chat with Long-Term Memory - Enhance existing AI chat to function as persistent ADHD coach remembering past conversations struggles and victories. Key features: Memory of past task struggles and what helped, Pattern recognition across weeks/months, Personalized strategies based on user history, Proactive check-ins referencing past context, Emotional support during overwhelm. Differentiates by being trained on ADHD challenges. Priority: NORMAL

result.summary: AI Coaching Memory implemented with pattern analysis, completion tracking, and context injection into AI conversations. Tracks completion patterns and effective strategies over time

task-1770108249838-siz6dd.description: Location-Based Context-Aware Reminders - Implement smart reminders triggering on location context not just time. Already in Gather Phase 2 roadmap. Key features: Remind when near specific locations for errands, Remind when arriving home for household tasks, Remind when leaving work for transitions, Integration with calendar locations. ADHD users struggle with time-based reminders due to time blindness. Priority: NORMAL

result.summary: Location-Based Reminders implemented with Browser Geolocation API, geofencing support for entering/leaving areas, full UI suite including LocationPicker, LocationTriggerPicker, LocationReminderToast, and LocationPermissionPrompt

task-1770108251379-s6pa8h.description: Persistent Nagging Mode Due App Style - Add optional persistent reminder mode for critical tasks that keeps nudging until completed. Due app auto-snooze is called lifesaver by ADHD users. Key features: Toggle for nag me until done on individual tasks, Customizable nag interval 1-5-15 min, Escalating notification style, Easy snooze without dismissing, Celebration when completed. Critical for bills medications time-sensitive tasks. Priority: NORMAL

result.summary: Persistent Nagging Mode implemented with 4-level escalation system (GENTLE ‚Üí PERSISTENT ‚Üí URGENT ‚Üí CRITICAL), Web Notifications API integration, customizable intervals (1/5/15 min), and in-app NagReminderToast component with quick snooze buttons

task-1770138151210-whhpre.description: Refactor GatherApp.tsx (1,224 lines) - Extract modal management into useModalManager hook, extract location logic (lines 176-223) into custom hook, create TaskActionHandlers.ts for handlers like handleDeleteTask/handleSnoozeTask/handleScheduleTask, move calendar handlers to useCalendarActions hook. Target: reduce to ~800 lines.

Target: reduce to ~600 lines.

task-1770138156251-w8tsh6.description: Add accessibility improvements - Add aria-label to all icon-only buttons in TaskView menu, add role="list" and role="listitem" to task lists in HomeView, add aria-live="polite" to AI response areas, add aria-describedby for form inputs with hint text. Components: TaskView.tsx, HomeView.tsx, StackView.tsx, AICard.tsx

task-1770138158681-po1z49.description: Add E2E tests for Session 17 features - Create e2e/location-reminders.spec.ts, e2e/coaching-memory.spec.ts, e2e/nagging.spec.ts, e2e/gamification.spec.ts to cover LocationPicker, CoachNotes, NaggingSettings, and GamificationCard components.

task-1770138160728-4y3ktk.description: Add React.memo to list item components - Wrap TaskListItem, StepItem, and AICard with React.memo to prevent unnecessary re-renders when parent state changes. These components render in lists and re-render frequently.

task-1770138163418-2ree00.description: Add error handling to API fetch calls - Many API calls silently fail with empty catch blocks. Create centralized error handling utility, add user-visible error states for failed data fetches. Locations: useUserData.ts (lines 341-377), useMemory.ts (lines 56-96), StackView.tsx (lines 205-265).

task-1770138991702-nkqkua.description: Reduce HomeView clutter - make Calendar/Email/Stats collapsible, hide Gamification until user has points

task-1770138992276-bmfn8v.description: Surface nagging/location indicators on TaskListItem cards (bell icon for nagging, location pin when trigger enabled)

task-1770138992961-umtssv.description: Create unified Task Settings sheet instead of 4+ separate modals (schedule, due date, energy, nagging, location)

task-1770138993627-u1z8mt.description: Add --warning color variable to design system for amber states, fix NaggingSettings color inconsistencies
